transcript_chunks.text: starfields biggest update since launch arrives May 15th come on so as you may know I was the lead review for Starfield for kind of funny and I gave it a four out of five I even said at that time I have to judge the game for what it is today not for what it could be tomorrow yeah this is tomorrow yeah this is you go I can see the potential of what they can add to this to enhance the game to make it even better and these this exactly what this update is
